archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.11: Operational details about hardware (e.g. business purpose, owner and physical location) should be recorded in a register (e.g. a corporate asset register that contains details about both hardware and software), together with other relevant information, including:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
